class_e_04_battle_01:
Sorry to all of you who went to the schoolyard
first before finding the right room![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_04_battle_02:
I guess we can do our tests in the classroom, at
least! It might be hard to write your answers out\r
on the field![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_04_battle_03:
All right! Time to put on your game faces and do
battle with those test sheets![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_04_question_01:
1. The higher a Pokémon’s Sp. Def, the less
    damage it takes from _____ attacks.

A) Physical
B) Special
C) Terastal
class_e_04_question_02:
2. Which of the following has no effect on a
    move’s damage?

A) The move’s type
B) The move’s power
C) The move’s name
class_e_04_question_03:
3. How many Trainers are on a Tera Raid Battle
    team?

A) Three
B) Four
C) Eight
class_e_04_question_04:
4. What is an effective method for breaking an
    opponent’s Tera Shield?

A) Switching Pokémon
B) Terastallizing and attacking
C) Cheering
class_e_04_question_05:
5. What is Ms. Dendra’s favorite type?

A) Fighting
B) Fire
C) Psychic
class_e_04_battle_04: Time’s up! Put your pencils down![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_04_battle_05:
I saw you giving it everything you’ve got! I’m sure
you’ll all get perfect scores![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_04_battle_06:
Well done, everyone. You can ask for your scores
at the front desk![VAR 0114(0024)]
